NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​IUpdateAvailable
public interface
NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​IUpdateAvailable
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​Avalonia.​UpdateAvailableWindow
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WinForms.​UpdateAvailableWindow
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WPF.​UpdateAvailableWindow

Interface for UI element that shows the release notes, and the skip, install, and later buttons

Events
UserResponded
event UserRespondedToUpdate UserResponded

Event fired when the user has responded to the skip, later, install question.

Functions
Show
void Show(
bool IsOnMainThread
)

Show the UI that displays release notes, etc.

HideReleaseNotes
void HideReleaseNotes()

Hides the release notes

HideRemindMeLaterButton
void HideRemindMeLaterButton()

Hides the remind me later button

HideSkipButton
void HideSkipButton()

Hides the skip update button

Properties
Result
UpdateAvailableResult Result { get }

Gets the user choice on how to handle this update (e.g. skip, remind me later)

CurrentItem
AppCastItem CurrentItem { get }

Gets or sets the current item being installed (the item that the user should update to)

Functions
BringToFront
void BringToFront()

Brings the update info UI to the front of all windows

Close
void Close()

Close the UI that shows update information
